response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to you and our company's valuation, we propose to sell the product to you at a special offer price of $950,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to both parties, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a transaction that meets your expectations. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 950000}
